org.gridgain.grid
Class GridRuntimeException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              org.gridgain.grid.GridRuntimeException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GridCacheDataStructureInvalidRuntimeException, GridCacheDataStructureRemovedRuntimeException, GridCacheFlagException, GridClosureException, GridEnterpriseFeatureException, GridifyRuntimeException
public class GridRuntimeException
extends RuntimeException

Common runtime exception for grid. Thrown by all components wherever runtime exception is needed.

Method Detail

hasCause

public boolean hasCause(@Nullable
                        Class<? extends Throwable>... cls)
Checks if this exception has given class in 'cause' hierarchy.

Parameters:
cls - Cause class to check (if null, false is returned)..
Returns:
True if one of the causing exception is an instance of passed in class, false otherwise.

getCause

@Nullable
public <T extends Throwable> T getCause(@Nullable
                                                 Class<T> cls)
Gets first exception of given class from 'cause' hierarchy if any.

Parameters:
cls - Cause class to get cause (if null, null is returned).
Returns:
First causing exception of passed in class, null otherwise.
